abstract: Millions of green card holders are intentionally forgoing United States citizenship, citing reasons including lack of desire, opposition to US policy and patriotism for their native country; as many as 40 percent of all green card holders do not naturalize, upending popular narrative at the core over debate about immigration.
lead_paragraph: Many green card holders have everything needed for citizenship except the desire — some don’t feel American; some dislike American policies; some don’t care.

headline.main: Making Choice to Halt at Door of Citizenship
headline.print_headline: Making Choice To Halt at Door Of Citizenship

snippet: Many green card holders have everything needed for citizenship except the desire — some don’t feel American; some dislike American policies; some don’t care....
